languages.text: "Зачем ты спрашиваешь его? Когда можешь просто взять и использовать, как тебе желается".
"Why are you asking him when you can take what you want and use it how you want?"
languages.original_text: "Зачем ты спрашиваешь его? Когда можешь просто взять и использовать, как тебе желается".

traits.locale_text: "Why are you asking him when you can take what you want and use it how you want?"
"Why are you asking him when you can take what you want and use it how you want?"
"Why are you asking him when you can take what you want and use it how you want?"
"Why are you asking him when you can take what you want and use it how you want?"
"Why are you asking him when you can take what you want and use it how you want?"

languages.text: 「望んだものを得られ、望んだようにできるというのに、なぜ彼に尋ねているのか？」
languages.original_text: "Why are you asking him when you can take what you want and use it how you want?"

traits.locale_text: 「望んだものを得られ、望んだようにできるというのに、なぜ彼に尋ねているのか？」

languages.text: “你既然随时随地都可以得到你想要的东西，可以随心所欲决定这一切的用途，那为什么还要征求他的意见呢？”
languages.original_text: "Why are you asking him when you can take what you want and use it how you want?"

traits.locale_text: “你既然随时随地都可以得到你想要的东西，可以随心所欲决定这一切的用途，那为什么还要征求他的意见呢？”

languages.text: "Warum fragt Ihr ihn, wenn Ihr nehmen könnt, was Ihr wollt, und es einsetzen könnt, wie Ihr wollt?"
languages.original_text: "Why are you asking him when you can take what you want and use it how you want?"

traits.locale_text: "Warum fragt Ihr ihn, wenn Ihr nehmen könnt, was Ihr wollt, und es einsetzen könnt, wie Ihr wollt?"

languages.text: « Pourquoi lui demandez-vous son avis, alors que vous pouvez prendre ce que vous voulez et en disposer comme bon vous semble ? »
languages.original_text: "Why are you asking him when you can take what you want and use it how you want?"

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi lui demandez-vous son avis, alors que vous pouvez prendre ce que vous voulez et en disposer comme bon vous semble ? »

languages.text: «¿Por qué le pregunta a él cuando puede usted tomar lo que quiera y usarlo como le parezca?».
languages.original_text: "Why are you asking him when you can take what you want and use it how you want?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué le pregunta a él cuando puede usted tomar lo que quiera y usarlo como le parezca?».

languages.text: "İstediğinizi alıp dilediğiniz gibi kullanabilecekken neden ona soruyorsunuz?"
languages.original_text: "Why are you asking him when you can take what you want and use it how you want?"

traits.locale_text: "İstediğinizi alıp dilediğiniz gibi kullanabilecekken neden ona soruyorsunuz?"
